item.title: Short-Form Editor Needed for Ecommerce Ads - Upwork
item.description:
We are an Ecommerce Brand Holding Company with a specialization in Shopify Dropshipping via Facebook and TikTok Advertising. We have two main brands in operation.

We are looking for a young, expert-level short-form editor with expertise in viewer retention, virality, and conversion.

Please reach out for more info. Thanks!


Hourly Range: $30.00-$70.00
Posted On: June 27, 2024 05:24 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing
Skills: Video Editing
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply
